title: The "Stone Man" - India's unresolved serial killer case.
selftext:
Hey everyone! ðŸ‘‹

While doing some research on historical crime figures in India, I stumbled upon a fascinating (and chilling) case about the ever-mysterious ["Stone Man"](https://youtu.be/3XTDdGEIv5M).

"The Stoneman" is responsible for a series of murders spanning several cities and decades - Mumbai in the 1980s, Calcutta in 1989, Guwahati in 2009, and parts of Assam in 2016. The victims, often homeless and vulnerable, were found with their skulls smashed, presumably with a stone, earning the murderer the moniker "Stoneman." The identity of this killer remains shrouded in mystery to this day.

Do you have any theories or insights about this case?
comments: Most likely copycats and not a single killer.
